title: SOC Level 2 Certification
description: Achieved the SOC Level 2 certification from TryHackMe after completing over 45 advanced hands-on defensive security labs.

title: Practical Junior Penetration Tester (PJPT) Certification
description: Preparing for the TCM-Security Practical Junior Penetration Tester (PJPT) certification to validate offensive security proficiency through hands-on exploitation of networks, web applications, and Active Directory in a controlled lab environment.
